rows.title: Welcome to @global.app_name
rows.message_text:
Discover the AE App! This app is designed to support farmers grow healthy crops using sustainable farming practices, also called agroecology (AE).

@global.app_name is here to support you.

Here is how to use the app:
Click on Farming Topics to explore tips and learn more about soil health, managing pests and family nutrition.
Here are key ideas or principles to guide your farming activities.
Use the library to get extra information about pests ...
